 2011-02822011-03-03,  ,  CH,  , 
ActConstitution Act, 1867
SubjectAdministrator (BC) J. Keith Bracken June 27 - July 29, 2011 Robert J. Bauman July 30 - September 6, 2011
PrecisAppointment to serve as ADMINISTRATOR of the Government of British Columbia 1) the Hon. J. KEITH BRACKEN from June 27 to July 29, 2011, inclusive and 2) the Hon. ROBERT J. BAUMAN from July 30 to September 6, 2011, inclusive.
AttachmentsAttachment
